item.title: Flexbox your buttons.
item.description: There are certain properties that are not consistently applied across elements. If you’ve ever tried to style a <select /> or <input type="file" /> element you have experienced this. This doesn’t apply only to the visual styles we were pained by in the past, but also by layout properties such as display: block;. I am working on a Phonegap project these days so I have a rather narrow range of rendering engines to support.
